Software Infrastructure (DevOps)



The projects were related to software management, CI/CD and configuration management automation in S.LSI Division, Samsung Electronics. To acheive the goal, I set up Github and Jenkins for team members and Python virtual environment with Anaconda.


Table of Contents

  • 1. CI/CD Automation
  • 2. Python Virtual Environment
  • 3. DB & Server Monitoring


1. CI/CD Automation


Description

The goal of this project was to manage and automate CI/CD with Github and Jenkins. Github was used for configuration management based on Gitflow, and Github webhook was used to launch build and deploy. The series of pipelines were created with Blue Ocean.


Skills

C shell
Jenkins
Blue Ocean
Github


Period

1+ years

  • 1 Jan
    2020

  • Present
    2021

Related Articles



2. Python Virtual Environment


Description

The goal of this project was to manage Python virtual environment in a team. As team members shared Python environment, they struggled with conflict issues in package versions. To solve this problem, I set up Python virtual environment with Anaconda in offline.

Skills

C shell
Anaconda


Period

1+ years

  • 1 Jan
    2020

  • Present
    2021

Related Articles



3. DB & Server Monitoring


Description

The goal of this project was to monitor Oracle DB, MongoDB and server . Metrics were collected with metrics collecter, and Prometheus and Grafana were used to monitor and visualize data.

Skills

Python
Go
Prometheus
Grafana


Period

1+ months

  • 1 Mar
    2021

  • Present
    2021
